content.detailedDescription:
hello,

if u go to my site below and watch the lake of the ozarks grand glaze time lapse movie... i have never seen this before...

*(link moved to additional evidence section below)sgonzalez/cms.


very unusual lens reflection, atmospheric conditions or alien ball of
light/fire appears in this movie. watch close at 1800 [6pm] till about 18:45
when it descends into the water.  look very close one can almost see
something in the water coming toward the "ball of light" as it enters the lake.
content.summary: very unusual lens reflection, atmospheric conditions or alien ball of light/fire.

content.detailedDescription:
my girl friend went outside to take some pictures of a storm coming in. she took three photos right within 1 minute of each other. i will post all three photos as a time line. the second photo has a faint circle in the middle of some rain in the distance, resembling the shape of the object in the third photo. in the third photo taken just mere seconds later there is a prominent object in the top right corner of the photo. 
  the camera use is a dsc-w80 sony cybershot, and the camera was set to auto focus. we have taken many thousands of pictures with this camera and never seen anything resembling a orb or strange object. i truly believe this object is real. the photos have been untouched. 
   she went outside to take photos at around 6:30pm. after taking the pictures she loaded them to the computer to look at in higher resolution. she told em to come over and look at them and the object jumped out to me. she then was freaked out and started to call her mother to tell her. looking at the object under high magnification does not resemble any flying object i have ever seen. it looks like a oval separated by rivets on on the top and bottom of the craft with a glowing orange-red light in the middle of the rivets. we have looked at these photos repeatedly now and cannot come to an answer. we are not sure what it is.
content.summary: Taking pictures of storm and captured ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Hola soy *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) y yo vi un ovni fue 4 de marzo alas 10:30pm del 2008 era una noche tranqula hacia un poco de frio  subio al techo para descansar de pronto cuando mira el cielo me doy cuenta que al costado de mi casa vi lo k nunca hubiera pensado ver vi un objeto brillante que estaba parado como 3 minuto asi k yo no contaba con tomar una foto lo uniko k hice es dibujarlo me parecion que era un bola de enrgia grande chispiando cuando lo dibuje el bojeto se movio yo estaba un poco nervioso al principio pense que era un faro de foco pero no era demasiado brilllante y usualmente el uniko faro que hay por aqui es de una discoteca o fiestas grande eso na mas que alcanza una altura alta 
el objeto se estaba acercando hacia a  mi  hacia mi techo lento cuando estaba acercando yo hice lo siguiente grite y le dije !Somos pacificos!  
el ovjeto salto a una velocida que un jet es imposible que lo haga y un helicoptero lo que vi fue extra���o y me gustaria saber lo que era pero lo unico k yo se es que eso no era de este mundo una cosa tenia en esa a���o 15 a���os ahora estoy en la universidad cesar vallejo desde que paso ese acontecimiento eh estudiado esto objeto tengo archivos o caso pocos pero creibles  un acontecimiento que si fue verdadero es 10 min - 17 jul 2007 
cuando en lima alas 6 am mas de 20 objetos volaron en cielo peruano cuando la fuerza aerea no sabia de ese y no lo detectaron fue raro pero paso y ese acontocimiento paso en mexico tambien con las misma discripcione volaban y hacia figuras extra���as que nosotros no sabiamos que ra lo mismo paso en lima me gustaria un ufulogo estoy investigando estudio ing de sistemas tengo 17 a���os gracias espero que con estos comente algo y si yo les creo hace a���os que creo en esto desde los 10 a���os creo en esto esta carta quiero que la lea uno de mis admiradores el william j.Birnes ufulogo
content.summary: Era un disco de brillante en forma de circulo por arriba chispiante.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out watering the front yard and looked up to the west and spoted a plane flying in southernly direction. the plane was crossing underneither what i suspect was venus. the time was 9:35p (approx as i backed into the event time after). i was tracking the plane with my eyes when i spotted a light moving in the other direction but way further up. i thought this was possibly a satalite or something. after about 3 seconds the light disappeared completely. i then spotted a second light 10 degress lower to the horizon and about 5 degresss to the left, this light was moving much faster in a similar direction to the first. then the first light appeared again stationary. then the second light changed direction with a sharp 45 degree angle to the west and took off at great speed. both the first and second now stationary object disappeared.

i called my daughter out to the firnt yard and we continued to scan the area of venus but duid not see anything out of the ordinanry after a few minutes. 

i thought the entire event was strange and it left me with a sinking feel that i had just witnessed something unussual. i said to my daughter afterwards that i might have been witness to a ufo sighting.
content.summary: I saw  a couple of lights in the sky moving in impossible ways.

content.detailedDescription: The aircraft was triangular, with a triangular light at each of the tips. it flew in from the south, heading north and made a slight banking maneuver but continued on it's course.  it flew sooooo low, i really didn't even believe what i was seeing. it was absolutely silent but was very bright, but plain as day. i was standing in my driveway smoking a cigarette as i usually do about this time of night before bed, i like seeing shooting stars and lately, have noticed a lot of what appeared to be stars or satellites so i was just out watching like normal.  the thing appeared out of nowhere and really almost gave me a heart attack.  this thing was much faster than a plane flying overhead.  it was so fast it appeared to leave tracers in its path.  my heart about jumped out of my chest and i really don't even know what to think anymore, about anything!  i called the faa because that's the only thing i could think of, and the guy said he would get in touch with the local faa or whoever and see what was going on.  i am so freaked out right now, i really think i need to talk to someone or something, i just think they would think i was crazy for what i saw. i 100% know that i saw it. i have never beem more sure about anything before in my life.  i even ran along the tree line so i could watch it for as long as i could. it just happened so fast, i had no time to do anything except for yell "oh my god! please tell me this isnt happening and this is fake" but i know it wasn't and infact, within a few short minutes, i saw an airplane flying in the vacinity of the craft almost as if they were up there looking for something, please get back to me and tell me i wasn't the only one who saw that. there is no possible way that i was the only person in this whole state that was looking up at that time.
content.summary: Gigantic compared to a plane in the sky, absolutely silent, flew extremely low and kept going until i couldn't see it anymore.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up out my window at the stars, i spotted it becuse due to the bright blinking white light; but as i gazed out at it more carfuly i realized it was changing in random intervuls to blue and green as well as white. it moved in short distances from left to right and stopped breifly just to change colors. it seemed either very small or very big and a long way up. it looked like a star but it also looked like it could have been a bullet or diamond shape but i can't tell due to the distance. i seen it at exactly 3:38 am but it may have been there longger. i could not watch it as long as it was there due to a dissablity but i looked out every few minutes and it was still there.
content.summary: Small color changing; white, blue, and green quickly moving from left to right.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband & i were traveling nw on hwy. 285 n. of roswell, n.M.  approx. 10 mi. or so out of town is when i saw this blinking star looking light.  my husband was sleeping and it was approx. 1 a.M.  at 1st thought it was a plane then realized was too low (above power lines)  it was not moving.  then i was trying to rule out in my mind perhaps it was a cell tower of some sort and then the flashes extended away from main star like flash of light, but just instantly there were 2 extra flashes beyond the main flash.  as i drove closer the blinking light was consistant.  when i was approx. 10 blocks away the blinking light shot at incredible speed towards us and as i watched it and looked out the window it appeared like a set of wings on a plane with two large lights on each side and a cone shape center.  i tried to wake my husband by telling him i think i am seeing a ufo, but he did not wake up and  as i slowed down it vanished.  i looked in the rearview mirror and the sky was pitch black - no lights.  i passed a semi truck shortly after and went another 30-40 miles and by this time the semi truck was probably a 1/2 mile or more behind me.  i looked in my rearview mirror and saw the semi truck headlights and that exact same star shape blinking light above the semi truck lights.  

i wanted to pull over to the side of the road when the object approached us earlier before i saw the light again above the semi, but realized we are out in the middle of nowhere, pitch dark and just had a weird feeling that this would not be in our best interest.
content.summary: Very fast blinking star shape with right side protruding out to sharp point.  every 3rd  blink or so would project extra blinks of lights from the longest sharpest point.

content.detailedDescription: Monday night a friend and i were out on my driveway talking and star gazing when my friend robin saw something to the west of us approaching along a straight contolled path traveling in an eastern direction.  at first i could not see what he was talking about in the night sky.  when he told me to look straight up and that it was about to pass above my car as the reference point i saw it.  the night sky was very clear dark.  the object was a distinct v-shape, very dark in color making absolutely no sound.  it appeared to be dark grey, just slightly lighter than the sky making it visible to us.  it blended in very well, but due to the color difference we could see it clearly once we could locate it and follow it with our eyes.  the shape was the only distinct characteristic.  the surface looked lumpy not smooth like a stealth bomber.  i thought it was flying pretty low in comparison to the many planes that pass over my house on a regular basis as they approach lax.  it flew at a constant speed, which didn't seem very fast, so we were able to track it for a couple of minutes before we lost sight of it.  as the city lights caused the sky to be lighter further to the east the craft blended in completey leaving us to loose sight.  the ufo had no lights, and the shape was a much tighter v then the shape of the b-2 stealth.  i assume it was a military plane of some sort, but the scarry thing is, i don't really know what we saw.
content.summary: Silent dark v-shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: On the above date and time i was working from 7pm to 7am my normal shift. i observed a fast moving diamond shaped object moving very fast, high and bright accros the sky moving north to south. i could not tell how high it was but the object appeared to illuminate some of the clouds. it only took about 30 seconds from when i noticed it from a 11:00 posistion until it went out of sight. it traveled a very straight course no angels what so ever. i thougt it looked out of place it did not resemble a metior or satelight. i have worked nights on and off for many years and i have never seen anything like this before. i thought about it for along time before i took action to report it. i have worked an trained as a professional observer although i have been working as a civilian at the time of the sightiing due to some physical issues. i was hoping some one elese saw this object that could tell me what they thought it was. i would be happy to talk to a representitive of mufon but i want to stay anonymous due to my occupation.
content.summary: Traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I read the report of someone seeing ufos on a webcam in santa cesaria or cesarea in italy, so i found it and checked it out.  

i will attach more pics in a second submission.  

it's infrared photography at night.  looks like black and white.  the area is very well lit, and you can see the shore, a big hotel/spa, a parking lot, and some landscape across a little bay.  lights blink on and off, you see a bit of traffic lights, and closer in, garbage trucks, etc.

at first, what i saw was identical to the photo attached to that earlier report i had just read. (1st pic) i checked the times/date and reloaded and re-reloaded a few times, and finally concluded i was actually looking at the current pictures and the same object was visible. i was surprised at that.

the webcam pics showed several areas in the water that looked fuzzy, kinda weird, including the one very interesting object, kind of a gyropscope-looking thing.  these seemed stationary, so i thought, well maybe it's lens flare.   you see a lot of "ufos" that look like just lens flare.  (will someone please tell people about lens flare?)

and then i saw this little glowing sphere floating over the water.  it was gone in a few seconds.  my husband and daughter came over to watch it.

and  then i saw a jelly-bean shaped glowing object travel along the shore, seeming to hover over the water, from right to left.  hmmm.  it seemed kind of fast, though i cannot tell the actual scale of the scene too well.  

then a couple of minutes later, the gyroscope thing was just gone.  poof.  is it a beacon of some kind, i wonder.

now, my curiosity was piqued, so i watched for about a half hour more.  when it was a bit lighter out, i saw another glowing ship of some kind, i guess jelly bean again.  (2d, 3d pic)   i biggified the picture and it looks like a hot dog or a glowing catamaranish kind of thing.  i saw what looked like disturbances below the water.  are there whales there so close to land?  i saw the misty-looking area again for a bit. (separate pics)

i saw a motor boat later on, when it was nearly light.  it was a lot smaller and some slower than the glowing thing.

i think the area bears watching, at least.
content.summary: Santa cesaria webcam--see diff. report from 8/03/2010.

content.detailedDescription:
"a" and i were going down bluffton road headed south by quimby village plaza. she saw a cloud formation that looked like an angel but could not get a good picture from where we were at. *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)  was using her cell phone to take the picture,so i pulled into the parking lot and drove over to where we could both get a better view. we both stared at the cloud formation in wonder as she started taking some pictures.The clouds looked like an angel holding a scepter with smoke coming out of the end. it could have been 5 to 10 minutes that we sat there and maybe 15 seconds worth of pictures. she took the pictures as soon as we parked by the restaurant. we sat there for a few minutes and then went home. she wanted to download the pictures into the  computer as soon as we got home,but it did not work out that way.   
     as soon as we awoke saturday morning she downloaded the pictures,wow what a surprise, we looked at each other in amazement.We saw an orb shape, just above the scepter and one above the light fixture in the background. as you look at the scepter you can see what appears to be a cone shape coming out of the end of scepter and going into the sky.The orb grows in size but the one above the light does not, at one point the orb moves from side to side and moves into the cone. you can see from the photo what appears to be some sort of orangish-colored disc with the orb that has moved into the cone. then the orb fades into the sky and reappears and when it reappears its brighter and larger in size and the smaller one by the light has disappeared. if you look closer at the picture you can still see the cone coming from the end of the scepter.To our surprise you can see an orangish- colored disc also, close to the top of the page within the cone.  
     those were the only pictures we took because the formation began the dissapate. we have several more photos of the ufo than what are allowed to be sent here.  they are all time-stamped and taken within seconds of each other in order.  the ones sent in are the last 3 photos taken.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a ufo while taking a couple of pictures of a cool cloud formation that looked like an angel.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving late in the night, 3;30 am, to go on vacation and was only on the highway for 2min when i saw a green light in the sky. i could see that it was spinning b/c the light was rotating and could make out a small disc shape. it was pretty far away and the way it moved was strange. it flew very fast at first i thought it was a meteor, but it flew straight then down towards earth. my fiance was in the passenger seat and witnessed it as well. she started to freak and actually cried a lil, i also felt that urge and barley held it in. the feeling after seeing it is so hard to describe but it was fear and fascination. the way it was moving and the colors ment it had to be a craft of some sort but judging by the speed it couldnt have been anything human. where it flew down was about 2miles away and was in an area that is woods in between towns. it only lasted about 5 seconds and i could have easily mised it. i am glad my fiance saw it as well b/c she would have never believed me. there was nothing in the papers about anything in the sky so what could it b. i never doubted other life than on earth, i mean think about the universe, how huge it is and think if a civilization had a million years of evolution more than us. i believe!
content.summary: Spinning green light very fast that flew straight then dived to ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside helping the family with yard work. it was about 8:00 pm, still pretty bright out. i happen to look up and see a cigar ufo off in the distance heading west. it was already really far away so it dissapeared out of sight fairly quick. i was curious, but since it was already gone i just dissmissed it. then about not even 5 min later, right above my house heading south-east another one appears moving slowly through the air. i was astounded for that was the second one i had seen today. not to mention the one above my house last night. anyway, as the second cigar ufo vanishes into the south-eastern horizon i start to wonder why i've seen so many in a short time. as i'm deep in thought i see another cigar ufo heading in the exact opposite direction of the second one. this would be the third cigar ufo. i get the bright idea, considering this one was fairly low in the sky, to whistle and wave my arms in the air at it. i continue this, getting more loud in volume untill the front end of it lights up bright red as if saying "hello! i'm waving back at you!" and just as this happens another cigar ufo appears only a couple hundred feet behind the the third one. they are on the same path in sky. this fourth one is following the third with strange precision. this whole event just quite literally blow my mind. as a ufo hunter, i've learned that cigar ufo's are a pretty rare occurence, but in the past two days i've seen 5!!!!! i have a picture that i can't post on here because i want to enlarge it for a better veiw. if you have any questions or comments please contact me at [email deleted/cms/tg] or my home phone number [phone number deleted/cms/tg]. i will also be doing a sketch of the pattern and behavior of the ufo. to all you ufo hunters out there "good luck and keep your eyes on the skies!"
content.summary: 4 cigar ufos within half an hour right above my house!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at 9:35 pm and i saw the red globe in the east sky. it was about the size of a full moon. i called my wife out to see it. she saw it then went back in to get the camera. when i looked for it,it was gone. then it reappeared and moved further away eastward. that is when i got a picture of it. then it was gone and we did not see it again. it was our first sighting of a ufo. we do not know what it was, and we both saw it. tv news that night did not mention anything about it.

i spoke to a neighbor a week or so later and he saw a red globe at 2am one night within days after we saw it. i keep looking for it.
content.summary: It was a red sphere with a white center.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was leaving my uncle's house around 10:30pm central time. i made my way to i-20 heading west, as soon as i found my lane trying to get into the middle lane , i immediately noticed the light directly in front of me well above the horizon but not high enough for me to have to peek up out of my windshield. not wanting to be a bad driver i asked my girlfriend and brother what is that ? they responded looks like an airplane so by then i had reached my exit to head south on 360 on the overamp i took another glance at it and said are sure thats a plane it has no blinking lights none of the signs that screams im an airplane ! i then tell them stressing " keep your eyes on it dont loose it " it only takes 7 minutes to get back to my house exiting off of 360 i turn west on to my road. and the object was perfectly positioned in between the trees down the street, now that i had focused in on it and the trees are moving past me i was asking my brother and girlfriend if it was moving, no one could tell because of the cars movement. so i pulled over next to a junior high facing west behind the school i parked and turned off the car i was really excited and anxious to get some references to make some decision as to what it could be. well i got it cause it was right over the tree line and sure enough it's movements were little left , then up ,little right , back up , freeze , at one time it started coming back towards the south east but watched it gain altitude a bit and resume course back north west. overfilled with a rush i hopped back in the car went straight for my ladder and got on the roof with my brother we observed this light change it's colors by swirling a red from our left to our right followed by periods of orange then white it stayed a steady course for over a half an hour in between it would go dim then go out completely then reappear. i thought to myself after it had reappeared this is the real thing i point at all the planes and stars around for comparison all flights that go into dfw airport come over and around my house i saw three planes make there way across the sky and disappear before i even lost sight of the object over the trees no telling how long it was there it was 10 til midnight when i went inside the house to collect my thoughts it wasnt till the next morning that i wondered if anybody else saw it and thats when i ran across this site
content.summary: An orangish sphere slowly moved northwest across dallas/ft. worth swirling bright red and white light around its surface.

content.detailedDescription:
After hearing of my younger sons encounter the night before, my older son, his friend, and myself went to the same place outside of town to see if we could see anything. we got there at about 9 pm just as it was getting dark. skies were very clear and could many aircraft flying for miles around us. we were predominately looking west out of whiteman afb and the town of knob noster. after about 15 min. i stood up from my chair to look around and noticed two planes flying together at low altitude approaching from the east, over by sedalia. the two planes continued west to a point souht of the base then turned 90 deg. to the north at which point they started gaining altitude. i originally thought they were on approach but they should have been descending not ascending. they continued to a point just north of the base and the town at which point they made another 90 deg. turn to the east. the boys had been looking in this direction and had noticed nothing. when the planes made their turn to the east i looked almost directly up and a little north out in front of them a fair distance and noticed a huge dark triangle or chevron shaped object with 3 pale orange lights (not a b2 bomber) heading to the east almost directly over 50 hwy at medium to high altitude. the object made zero noise. the two planes sped up and gained on the object and it was obvious that they intended to follow. the object then sped of slowly and stayed out in front. we could see very well and followed the progress of both the object and the planes as they flew east to a point somewhere north of sedalia and perhaps beyond.The two planes had very bright flashing lights like most of the military aircraft here at the base. the airplanes disengaged at that point and we followed their progress back to the base where they landed. it wound up being two a 10 warthogs. looking back towards the north side of the sedalia lights we noticed several aircraft flying at medium altitude with the same distinctive bright flashing lights. the object was no longer visible at this point.
 at this point the three of us were on the phones telling various people of what we had seen. my son's friend called his girlfriend who lives in knob noster and told her we saw a ufo at which point she told him that she had just seen one above the trees just on the southside of town. she described the exact same object that we saw without matt having told her what our object looked like.
 after about ten minutes a few more high schoolers showed up along with one of their mothers. after another 5 min. i was pointing out to her where we had seen it and spotted another one coming from the west but farther north than the first. this one appeared to be following a plane instead of being followed. they continued to almost the exact same spot north of sedalia as the first. at this time we noticed between 10 and 14 aircraft stacked at different altitudes at this spot. the object appeared to split in two with one part going north and one part going south, but it was very far away at this point and hard to tell exactly what we were seeing.
 we then observed a plane leave that area and head in our direction where it immediately landed. another a 10. then we observed two more leave that area heading west in our dirction where they also landed. two more a 10's. then the same thing, then two more a 10's. for a total of seven.
 while all this was going we noticed 2-3 helicoptors orbiting a large area west of the base, roughly over knob noster state park. having lived in knob noster for the last 20 years, i can say that it is very unusual for helicoptors to be operating here at the base during night time hours, but i have seen it. maybe only once or twice though.
 after another hour or two we noticed no more planes north of sedalia, no more helicopters. then roughly half an hour after all that died down a b2 came in on approach, did a couple of touch and go's, then finally landed. not standard practice at this base in my opinion. touch and go's are normally done back to back to back with small orbits. have never seen a b2 come from somewhere distant, do a couple touch and go's then land. if they have been somewhere doing something, they simply land and taxi.
 all aircraft landed without the flashing landing strip lights being on which is also unusual. normally when the aircraft are landing the base has the blue flashing landing lights on. they did turn them on for about 30 seconds between the a 10's but then turned them back off and left them off.
 also while this was going we noticed zero commercial aircraft in the air. we had been seeing them, but after the first object we saw no more till perhaps 230 am. then we saw them in every direction. just an observation. 
 we are going back out tonight.
content.summary: Observed military aircraft chasing triangle shaped object at medium altitude for roughly 5 min. then observed second object following aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back deck, which is attached to the back of my home. the deck entrance is accessed from the dining room. at about 6:43 i noticed a round object moving from north to south. the object was at about 45 degrees above the horizon. i went into the house to get my binoculars, which took about five seconds since they were just inside the sliding patio door. i located the object a second time and i was able to see it between the tops of two trees. one of the trees is about 60-65 feet tall and the other tree is about 45 feet tall. the space between the tops of the trees is about 20 feet. the object was observed again between the two trees. from my vantage point the object was about 20 feet below the top of the tallest tree and about 5 feet below the shorter tree, which put the object at about a 45 degree angle.

there were not commercial or military jets in the area.  i live about 7 miles from offutt air force base. the object was not an airplane, or a weather balloon. it had no wings, made no noise, left no contrail. i would estimate the altitude at about 15 - 25 thousand feet. the sky was mostly clear with a few cumulus clouds. the sun was about 45 minuets from setting and the object was reflecting the sunlight and through the binoculars i could see that it was silver, like polished metal. it was traveling a bit slower than a commercial jet or military jet.

after the object went behind the second tree i could no longer see it and it did not reappear on the other side of the second tree. my conclusion is that it must have changed directions after i could no longer see it.
content.summary: I was sitting on my back deck looking at the sky & clouds. i then spotted the object between two trees. the object was about 45 degrees up from the horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in my car to go sing in waterloo, iowa; and was alone on the highway and it was a very beautiful day, not a cloud in the sky, just blue skys; when all at once i saw a glare in my left eye which i looked up at the sun, thinking it was glare from the sun, but when i looked to the right of the sun, i saw something odd. there was a tiny little cloud and i thought again, how odd, then as i was looking at it i saw a very shinney metal thing and then i saw it move, like a rotation movement, and when it did that the whole thing just disappeared, cloud and all, and were talking minutes/seconds, and then it was a clear blue sky again, as if nothing was there. i immedately realized that i had just seen a ufo, in the middle of the day, why?, it scared me, so i called my spouse and my sister by cell phone to tell them what had just happened in case something happened to me, it was that real!!!!!!!!!!!!


thank you
*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)
content.summary: Saw something very shiny off to the right of sun hiding behind a cloud. as i watched there was movement and then it all disappeared and there was nothing there at all but blue sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,again,i was taking random pics of the sky.(do you know,you will see some type of anomoly in every 6-10 pics.),i think these things are everywhere!.They seem to be cloaked untill you go through the process of filming,or videotaping,so that alot of the time,cannot be seen with the naked eye..So i decided they are too frequent to report.,everytime.,unless it is a (fantastic) sighting.,which this one threw me for a loop.
i am certain my 55 year old heart feels there is something incredible about to happen.I really didn't believe up untill a year ago,when i had my first sighting.,and many,many since then.Thank you.,& keep your eyes to the skies!!!!!
content.summary: At first it looked like the very tip of a phillips screwdriver.

content.detailedDescription: Hi,i have still been randomly taking pics,all hrs. of the day.This is ne pointing at the lady of the rockies here in butte.,so i did not see it when i shot this pics!I will not be sending anything much anymore(unless it is fantastic), because i have come to the conclusion,that they are everywhere.Approximately about 1 in every 6 snapshots have an anomoly in them.You cannot see these with the naked eye.,so i'm thinking that these things becomed uncloaked through the process of filming.It is hard to wrap your mind around about some of these anomolies that are in the air,day or nite.I know in my 55 year old heart,-something big is going to happen.
content.summary: The first thing i thought of was the pointed end of a phillips screwdriver or rotor of some sort.

content.detailedDescription:
After hurricane katrina hit new orleans, the city was closed for about a month. by late september i was back at my home in metairie, la for the first time since the storm. 

in early october electricity was finally restored making it possible to live in the house while i gutted it. there were few people living in their homes, so that at night the city seemed desolate. on my block, there were only 2 other homes (out of perhaps 30) with anyone living in them. 

throughout those fall months there were numerous helicopter sorties in & out of the city, most occurring during daytime hours. helicopters of all types were in the mix - coast guard helos, chinooks, blackhawks, hueys, even an osprey. 

i would work all day, pulling drywall out & flooring, breaking up tiles... a complete gutting job. i wouldn't get to bed until the early morning hours. one night, at about 3 am, i heard the sound of an aircraft slowly approaching my home. but it was unlike any other helicopter i had heard up until then. i hadn't fallen asleep yet, so i laid there listening to it as it came closer. finally, it seemed as if it came to a stop as it got above my house. it just hovered there. 

for about 10 minutes i laid in bed listening to it & wondering why it was no longer moving. i also tried to discern what type of aircraft it was since the sound was unrecognizable. it put out a low bass tone, similar to a powerful car stereo subwoofer. it was making my body vibrate from the strength of the sound. additionally, it was putting out a very high pitched whine, like that of a dremel multi-tool. but the whine was even more high pitched, as if it were a 50k rpm dremel (normal dremels are 10k rpm). the osprey aircraft were similar sounding but not quite the same. 

i decided to get out of bed, and shoo it away if i could. i was very tired from a hard day's work and i was beginning to get annoyed. when i stepped outside, in my boxers & t-shirt mind you, i walked out to the street. there was no one else around. most of the street lights were still out from the storm. i looked up, and there above my home was what certainly seemed to be a flat black triangle shaped object. on each corner were glowing sections that glowed a blueish white. there were no other lights on the object. the lights at the tips of the triangle were not like spotlights. they were more like very bright leds (the light emanated out equally in all directions). 

for 10 more minutes (now a total of 20 minutes) i stood there looking at it trying to make out what it was. i didn't get a camera since i didn't think 'ufo' at first. it was about 150 feet over my home. it seemed to be about 100 feet long on each edge. (about half the size of my house in total volume.) my first thought was perhaps it was a 'super osprey'. so i looked between the lights trying to make out some kind of structure. i looked at the large 30 foot high magnolia tree in front of my home, to look for rotor wash. there was none. i shaded my eyes trying to block out the glare, in hopes of seeing something besides the triangular shape... and still nothing. between the lights seemed to be a flat solid and dark object. there was no motion anywhere that i could see (no rotors, no wings, no cockpit). 

finally it started moving away slowly (20 mph) toward lake pontchartrain. i watched it for another few minutes. i went inside and i thought about it for a while trying to work out what it might be. i gave up and went to bed. i thought about it very little from then on since i could never find a plausible explanation. if it were some secret us military aircraft, why hover it 150 feet over the street in a major city? if it were an alien spacecraft, then why hover it 150 feet over the street in a major city? if it were a foreign military secret aircraft... why invade us airspace? if i was mistaken because of the glare, it would have had to be a very very large osprey. it would also have had different proportions from the osprey aircraft we know about, because of the equilateral nature of the shape. 

it wasn't until about 2 years later that i happened across a tv show about ufos. on that show people talked about seeing black triangles. i'm as certain as one can be that a black triangle ufo is what i saw above my home that night. what it is, i have no clue. but it was triangular, equilateral, appeared to be black, had 3 glowing ends & capable of hovering.
content.summary: Equilateral black triangle hovered over home in new orleans la at 3am cst for approximately 20 minutes in fall of 2005.

content.detailedDescription:
My son, sister in law, and her friend were driving heading north from south of whiteman afb here in knob noster, mo between 1 and 2 in the morning. all three observed a bright light in the sky towards the base that they observed for what they said was about 5 min. they thought it was military as we live close to the base, but as they got closer they observed it cross over the highway d at a rather low altitude then when they came even with it, it flew over the car making no noise and landed in a field just north of base property, but still south of knob noster proper just outside city limits. my son watched the entire event as he was not the driver and described it as a rotating x with several lights. they got scared and continued to drive into town and passed 2 or 3 police cars heading that direction moving fast. after informing me of what they had seen i went out there with my other son and his friend and observed nothing. no ufo, no police. but did notice that the base had several helicoptors operating do flyovers over the base, which is unusual. they normally only fly the helicoptors during daylight hours. we have lived here in knob noster for 20 years and have seen every kind of military aircraft known fly into the base here. what they saw and what they described landing did not have the flight characteristics or appearance of any other military aircraft ever observed by us.

this lead us to go out the next evening (aug, 4) to see if we could see anything that night. i will submit my personal report seperately.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Son, sister-in-law, and friend observed ufo while driving for about 5 min. before watching it land next to the road just outside city limits of knob noster, mo.

content.detailedDescription:
Spanish to english translation of short description--"on monday evening we had a sighting seen by over 50 people."--sgonzalez/cms.  

el objeto aparecio a 181 grados al sur casi cerca de la agencia espacial ecuatoriana el primer avistamiento fueron 2 luces realizaron un viraje y desaparecieron una nave rara con una luz incandecente en la parte de abajo.......................


otro avistamiento fue al sur oeste una nave peque���a con luz incandecente realizo un sobrevuelo y se fue en la madrugada cerca de las 5.30 de la ma���ana los medios ecuatorianos alegan que es una cometa pero eso no era una cometa.... fueron mas de 50 los testigos oculares porfavor busquen respuestas estamos muy asustados ya han habido 2 mas....
habian dos luces parpadeantes en cielo....
content.summary: La noche del lunes tuvimos un avistamiento que mas de 50 personas lo vieron.

content.detailedDescription: Last night my wife and i went outside in our back yard to see if there was a chance we could see the northern lights that the news had been talking about. i know i have made a lot of reports to mufon since the 4th of july but we keep see these objects flying over our house. at 9pm i saw a light moving thru the tree in our front yard and as it came into view at the top of the tree i saw it was the same orangish hot metal looking object that we have seen in the past (4 on july 4th and 2 on july 23rd and maybe 6 from a differant view point on the 30th of july). i told my wife look there is another one. the object was about 500ft up coming from the west heading east.It looked to be about the size of a suv. as it came over the house this time it slowed and almost came to a stop. it then went stright up and got dimmer as it went up. it looked like it went up about 500 to 800 ft higher than it was. again we could see a kind of see thru glowing grey sphere around the object and what looked like a disc shape inside. it then started moving east again and we watched it until we could not see it anymore. i took photo but i can not keep camera still so all you see is zig zag lines of light. i will keep trying when and if we see more. i don't know if this means anything but i felt fine before the sighting but right after sighting i had a need to go to the bathroom real fast and my stomach was knoted up for about a half hour after then i was fine my wife had no problems. we do not know what these things are or what they are doing but we seem to be seeing a lot of them. they do not seem to be of this world.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 object same as earlier reports low over house.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:00 pm i looked out my west window and saw an orange bar of light hovering seemingly over the town of lodi, ca.  approx. every second there would be a white flash from near the middle of the object.  object was fairly large - about an inch long from where i was.
after maybe 5 minutes another of the same objects, color, size and actions the same, appeared off to the side a bit, but lower down than the first one.  this second object was only visible for 10-15 seconds and vanished.
i continued watching for over an hour, then it seemed to get smaller as if  it were moving off to the west, so i quit watching
i knew this was not a plane for it did not move, and even a helicopter would not remain stationary that long.  also if it were a star or satellite it would have moved.
content.summary: Saw a flashing long bar of light hovering over lodi.

content.detailedDescription: After seeing 4 objects on the 4th and 2 on the 23rd from our back yard as reported in earlier reports my wife and i decided to go out side of town to get away from city lights just to see what we could see so we went out to the delta about a mile north of paradise point marina on the levee. at about 10pm i saw orangeish colored lights coming from the south heading northwest they seemed to be south of the marina hard to say how far it was but they were low in the sky and moving slowly. it looked like they may have been by the port of stockton which was about 10 miles from us. my wife also seen these objects there were 6 total they seemed to be about a 1/4 mile apart as they came northwest. they all did a slow wide turn to the west and then back south towards tracy. we were watching them thru binoculers until we could not see them anymore. there was no flashing lights you could see the street lights of the marina very clear and they seem to be about the same size and a few inches higher than the street light from our view point. maybe nothing but it did seem strange.
content.summary: 6 objects south of marina.

content.detailedDescription: Well, a little after midnight i went on my back porch to smoke a cigarette and i was watching the stars when i noticed an object that was about the same distance away as a satellite i had seen the night before, only this new object changed both speed and direction though i should point out the satellite the night before appeared to travel significantly faster,and was consistent in speed and direction. after 10 min of watching the object it suddenly disappeared. then, later that night, around 2:30 i was outside again and a really bright object i thought was a star(i had seen it earlier and didnt notice any movement) began pulsating(which i at first thought was just atmospheric distortion)strangely and after a few minutes it began to move! and while it moved i would notice strange flashes around the object. the object appeared to be a great distance away, an though i definitely noticed its movement, i would wonder if it really was moving because it would stay in the same general area of the sky, with long periods of holding still. but i will tell you i wouldn't have reported it unless i was positive of its movement. i witnessed it move around in the same general area of the sky and every time it did it was accompanied by a couple smaller objects that moved independently and there would be strange flashes around all three objects. there was also 2 star-like objects that exhibited the same behavior, they would chase each other around and have the same strange flashes around them, though these 2 objects did not stay in the same general area, they traversed the sky. i also noticed 3 or 4 shooting stars the same night but they where completely unrelated. i must also stress that all the anomalous things i saw last night appeared very far away, out of the atmosphere and farther then the satellite i had seen the night before( i say that because with the exception of the really bright object the stayed in the same general area, the satellite was larger and moved much quicker across the sky, and stayed in a straight line and consistent speed.) the first object seemed the closest but disappeared, the 2 objects chasing each other never left the night sky but seemed farther away than the first object and thus smaller. the object i thought was the most far away was the large bright light i mistaken for a star at first, it seemed slow because of the distance, with short bursts of acceleration. none of the objects traversed the entire night sky extremely quickly but i believe that was because of the distance at which i was seeing the objects.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Night time mass ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in the back yard watching the sky at 10pm on the 23rd. we were doing this because we had seen 4 objects fly over our house on the 4th so we have been spending more time watching the skys. coming from the west we saw this orange/yellow i said like fireball in other report but it was more like hot metal flying low about 500ft moving to the east as it come over it blinked out and back on again then out you could see a kind of see thru grey glow sphere shape around it as it moved east we saw what looked like a disc shape inside the glow we watched it until we  lost sight of it in the eastern sky. about a min later another one came over at the same place in sky it looked the same as the first and did the same thing as the first. they made no sound no sharp turns just went in a straight line in sky. i tryed to take a photo of second one with my cannon powershot a400 camera as it was right over us but it would not take. maybe just me i don't know never had problems before but after it past i was able to take 3 photos but all you can see is a very small dot in the photos. sence then we have seen alot of movement in the sky that do not seem to be planes or satelites very high up. what we have been seeing does not scare us it just makes us want to know what they are and what they are doing.
content.summary: 2 objects about a min. apart low over house.

content.detailedDescription: I looked up at the sound of a small plane and saw behind the plane a two tone gray upside down acorn shaped object decending at a 45 degree angle inthe opposite direction. it was overcast at the time and the object was dull colored i was picking cucumbers at the time.It was creepy. it disappeared behind some trees
content.summary: Decended at 45 degrees south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down lexington/lake drive to go to my buddies trailer home and suddenly a very random large vibrant display of fireworks began to erupt suddenly a couple streets down. as i was paying attention to the fireworks, a couple of lights caught my eye in the sky, they were a very exuberant red and blue glowing alternating lights, not flashing like an airplane or helicopter would. this ''ufo'' was in the sky for at least a couple minutes slowly gliding on by apass my head. suddenly within a minute or so after the accurance, a helicopter with a spotlight went chasing after it in the same direction the craft was going. i know what i saw was not an everyday flying craft. it slowly hovered across the sky at about the height maybe a news helicopter would report a police chase. this  ''ufo'' was so close to the ground that i even had the chance to snap a photo of the vibrant lights on my phone. it most certainly was a floating disk that went across the sky. and i am now a believer. this accurance happened 8-3-10 9:30pm it is extremely hard to see on my phone but when the photo is zoomed up like 300% you can actually see the circle body form of the craft around the lights!
content.summary: 2 very vibrant lights, 1 red 1 blue, and 1 white light.
